title: Count Manager
description: This function block manages a count value, allowing for incrementing and decrementing based on input signals while ensuring the count stays within specified limits.
name: COUNT_DR

input.name: SET
input.description: Signal to initialize the count to the input value.

input.name: IN
input.description: Input value used to set the count when 'SET' is true.

input.name: STEP
input.description: Amount to increment or decrement the count, defaulted to 1.

input.name: MX
input.description: Maximum value for the count, defaulted to 16#FFFFFFFF.

input.name: RST
input.description: Signal to reset the count to zero.
